Privacy Policy Close Cookie Disclosure Notice Pause Background Video The Caviar Bar A carefully crafted menu pays homage to Chef Vinson’s admiration & experience with caviar. An Immersive Experience A destination to see and be seen, the intimate 8-seat Caviar Bar at Zero George offers an experience all its own. Featuring Regiis Ova Caviar service, classic in presentation yet effortlessly modern, it can be paired with a selection of inventive à la carte dishes for a truly memorable indulgence. Book Your Reservation Opens in a new window. 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08

[Page Title: Vimeo] Vimeo Skip to content This website uses cookies. If that's okay with you, keep on browsing, or learn more about our . Privacy Policy Close Cookie Disclosure Notice November 7, 2025Press | Food & Wine: 6 Essential Culinary Experiences in Charleston Zero George Cooking School Featured in Food & Wine “Head to one of the city’s most charming boutique hotels, Zero George, for what feels like a wine-soaked dinner party disguised as an education. On weekends during the day or on Monday nights, guests gather around “the pass,” an open-kitchen counter where the chef prepares a three-course seasonal menu in front of the group. Past dishes have included heirloom tomato caprese with burrata balloons, steamed bass with ramp butter and truffles, and chocolate pot de crème with caramel honeycomb. Each course comes paired with wine and served as it’s completed. At $235 per person, the experience is capped at eight guests and booked through Resy, offering equal parts instruction and chef’s-table theater.” Read the feature on Food & Wine Share this post - Opens in new tab. - Opens in new tab. - Opens in new tab. This recognition honors the skill, creativity, and dedication of our culinary team and the unforgettable… Learn More October 15, 2025Press | Post & Courier: Fine Dining Restaurants Start to offer Zero-Proof Drink Pairings Charleston Fine Dining Restaurants Start to offer High-End Zero-Proof Drink Pairings “The Restaurant at Zero George is perhaps the first in Charleston to do so, thanks to forward-thinking lead bartender Casie Fennell. “People think they’ll be missing out by not being able to drink, but we are saying,… Learn More

[Page Title: Vimeo] Vimeo Skip to content This website uses cookies. If that's okay with you, keep on browsing, or learn more about our . Privacy Policy Close Cookie Disclosure Notice Pause Background Video An inspired and immersive tasting menu experience Start Exploring A tucked-away gem among Charleston restaurants, The Restaurant at Zero George offers the city’s most celebrated cuisine in an atmosphere of timeless charm. Book Restaurant Book Caviar Bar A Dynamic Tasting Menu for the Discerning Epicurean The Restaurant at Zero George The Restaurant at Zero George delivers some of Charleston’s boldest flavors and most dazzling dishes from one of the city’s tiniest professional kitchens. Recognized in the 2025 inaugural MICHELIN Guide American South, dining here is both refined and adventurous, celebrating local ingredients through elevated, artfully crafted cuisine. Experience for yourself why The Restaurant has earned Zero George a place among Condé Nast’s Top 5 Foodie Hotels in the World. Learn More An Elevated Caviar Experience The Caviar Bar at Zero George The Caviar Bar at Zero George invites you to savor Regiis Ova caviar and inventive caviar-inspired à la carte offerings in a warm, inviting setting. From classic favorites to creative twists, every bite is designed to delight, making it an unforgettable experience for both seasoned gourmands and curious palates alike. Learn more Opens in a new window. Step Behind the Scenes of Fine Dining The Classes at Zero George Gather at Zero George for an unforgettable Culinary Experience. Join a Cooking Class to watch our Chef bring inspired dishes to life, a Wine Class to explore exceptional vintages with our sommeliers, or indulge in Bourbon & Burgers, featuring rare whiskeys paired with our Royale with Cheese Wagyu Truffle Burger. Each class offers expert guidance and a deeper appreciation for extraordinary cuisine, wine, and spirits. Learn More Opens in a new window. From the street Dig in to some delicious articles. On weekends during the day or on Monday nights, guests gather around “the pass,” an… Learn More Give the Gift of Zero An extraordinary treat for the discerning traveler or epicurean soul. Delight them with a gift card from Zero George. Whether it is a weekend getaway, a meal at The Restaurant at Zero George, or cocktails and caviar at The Caviar Bar, our gift cards can be used for all hotel, dining, and bar experiences.
